member.summary: Defines the interface for an arbitrary custom view that can be shown in Visual Studio Code.

member.summary: Gets the unique ID of the view.

member.summary: Gets the display title of the view.

member.summary: Shows the view in the specified column.

member.returns: A Task which can be awaited for completion.

member.summary: Closes the view in the editor.

member.name: T:Microsoft.PowerShell.EditorServices.VSCode.CustomViews.IHtmlContentView
member.summary: Defines the interface for a custom view which displays rendered HTML content in an editor tab.

member.summary: Sets the HTML body content of the view.
member.param: The HTML content that is placed inside of the page's body tag.
member.returns: A Task which can be awaited for completion.

member.returns: A Task which can be awaited for completion.

member.name: M:Microsoft.PowerShell.EditorServices.VSCode.CustomViews.IHtmlContentView.AppendContentAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Appends HTML body content to the view.

member.returns: A Task which can be awaited for completion.

member.name: T:Microsoft.PowerShell.EditorServices.VSCode.CustomViews.IHtmlContentViews
member.summary: Defines an interface for a component which can create new IHtmlContentView implementation instances.

member.summary: Creates an instance of an IHtmlContentView implementation.
